mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.country, p.postalcode, p.dob, p.email, p.password, c.identification_type, c.identification_value, cl.wallet_bal FROM ft_person p LEFT JOIN ft_client_identification c ON p.id = c.person_id LEFT JOIN ft_client cl ON p.id = cl.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
